definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dub.; if text correct, open (NH Aram. [[שׁתם]] open [vessel]);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. cstr. [[הַגֶּבֶר שְׁתֻם הְעָָיִן]] Nu 24:3, Nu 24:15 (poems in JE) the man opened of [mental] eye, so SyrVer Ki Ew al. RVm; Vulgate Röd Ke Di al. render closed of [bodily] eye, reading then implicity [[שְׂתֻם]] (cf. [[סָתַם]], [[שָׂתַם]] La 3:8); v. further Gray.
